function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Construction activities may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases in the built environment.","Impact":"Potential increase in the transmission of contagious diseases among construction workers and residents.","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict health and safety protocols, including regular disinfection and proper ventilation.","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems and monitoring technologies for indoor air quality.","People":"Construction workers, building occupants, and surrounding communities.","Owner":"Construction companies, building owners, and local authorities."}]}
